{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Zoom |model=5350 |revision= |upc=726947110700 |ean= |asin=B0056VN9M4 |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=02/20/2012 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=cable modem, wireless router |fcc_id=BDN1092AWL, HEDMWG3401N |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=110-220 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=C7P |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand= |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (half) |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43225;BCM43225KMLG, HE1033 P20, 992333 3; |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=DOCSIS 3.0 |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=ZOOM |default_ssid_regex=^ZOOM$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:1A:2B |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} {{TagLine|DOCSIS 3.0 Cable Modem/Router with Wireless-N}}
[http://www.zoomtel.com/products/5350.html Product page] [http://media.cox.com/support/print_media/internet/equipment/Zoom_5350_User_Manual.pdf User manual] The wireless module used in this device is presumably also used by the '''SMC''' SMCD3GNB. It would also appear that this device is near identical to the SMCD3GNB..{{CableModemSpec |down_c=8 |up_c=4 }} The default SSID is, according to the manual, '''ZOOM'''. A 00:1A:2B ('''Ayecom''') OUI appears to be used for (at least) the wireless module. A 00:0B:B6 ('''Mototech''') OUI appears to be used for (at least) the cable modem. ==Images== File:5350-front.jpg|front File:5350-back.jpg|back [[Has images::external| ]] ==Likely compatible services== *{{Approved by service|Comcast}} ([http://mydeviceinfo.comcast.net/device.php?devid=294 '''Comcast''' device database entry])
